flawed_nl_solution:
Cole has to pay 3 * 9 = $<<3*9=72>>72 for one side of the side fence.
For the shared left fence, he has to pay two-thirds of 72, so he has to pay 72 * 2 / 3 = $<<72*2/3=48.0>>48.0.
The shared back fence will cost 3 * 18 = $<<3*18=54>>54.
He has to pay for half the back fence, so it will cost 54 / 2 = $<<54/2=27.0>>27.0.
Thus, Cole has to pay 48.0 + 72 + 27.0 = $<<48.0+72+27.0=147.0>>147.0 for the fence.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
